name: Kenji's Combat Forms:
landing_text: This Book is a guide/index to everything this mod has to offer!$(br2) )This guide book is currently not up to date with all the mod changing features from this update. $(br) I do apoligise, for not providing info about the update in this book. This update is really big and has taken a lot of work. Anyways, enjoy! $(br2) --<3
